channel.title: Wish granted!
channel.description:
ok someone on moparisthebest did this here's how it goes....
The person above you that just wished for something under him you say WISH GRANTED then under you have to say but,... and then tell them the bad thing to do
exp: i wish for a bike 1st one
but,... you have to eat it!! \
see how long we can keep this going
start!
i wish for a ego (paintball gun!)
